# Anthropic Support Documentation - Structural Overview

## Main Topics and Categories

This is the main landing page for Anthropic's support documentation, organized into the following categories:

### Product Documentation
| Category | Article Count | Description |
|----------|---------------|-------------|
| Claude | 67 articles | General Claude AI documentation |
| Paid Claude Plans | 23 articles | Subscription and billing information |
| Team and Enterprise Plans | 38 articles | Business/organizational plans |
| Claude API and Console | 36 articles | API usage and console management |
| Identity Management (SSO, JIT, SCIM) | 3 articles | Authentication and user provisioning |
| Claude Code | 9 articles | Claude Code product documentation |
| Claude Desktop | 7 articles | Desktop application support |
| Claude Mobile Apps | 21 articles | iOS/Android app documentation |
| Connectors | 20 articles | Integration connectors |

### Industry-Specific Documentation
- **Claude for Life Sciences** - 8 articles
- **Claude for Education** - 4 articles
- **Claude for Financial Services** - 17 articles
- **Claude for Nonprofits** - 6 articles

### Policy and Compliance
- **Privacy and Legal** - 19 articles
- **Safeguards** - 12 articles
- **Amazon Bedrock** - 6 articles

### Learning Resources
- **Video Tutorials** - 26 articles

## Supported Languages
Documentation available in 12 languages:
- English, Français, Deutsch, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Português, Pусский, 简体中文, Español, 繁體中文

## Notes
This is a navigation/index page only - no specific settings, commands, or configuration details are present on this page. Detailed information would be found within the linked article categories.
